Class SalesReport

public class SalesReport extends Object
Represents a sales report in the restaurant.

  • Constructor Details

    • SalesReport

      public SalesReport()
      Creates a Sales Report based on user inputs. Date taken it must match format required.

  • Method Details

    • selectRelevantInvoice

      public ArrayList<Invoice> selectRelevantInvoice()
      Filter invoices that fall within the requested time frames. Time frame is measured by the start and end date.
      Returns:
      the list of invoices which fall within the requested time frame.

    • generateSaleItemList

      public ArrayList<SaleItem> generateSaleItemList()
      Generates a list of order items purchased within the timeframe.
      Returns:
      the list of sale items with their quantities sold throughout timeframe according to the attributes start date and end date.

    • generateRevenue

      public double generateRevenue()
      Generates total revenue in a specific timeframe
      Returns:
      revenue earned from the timeframe

    • printSalesReport

      public void printSalesReport()
      Prints the Sales Report for a specific time frame.
